Title: detectLanguageMixed
Description: Similar to the detectLanguage function, but detectLanguageMixed returns a Map of 2-letter language codes that are mapped to the percentage of the certain language in the text.
text_to_be_analyzed — A collection (or sentences) of strings to analyze. String.
Map(String, Float32): The keys are 2-letter ISO codes and the values are a percentage of text found for that language
Examples: SELECT detectLanguageMixed('二兎を追う者は一兎をも得ず二兎を追う者は一兎をも得ず A vaincre sans peril, on triomphe sans gloire.');
